abilities.description: Once per fight, you can @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.eece9a67d1961f70]{Repair} by releasing a nanite swarm that reinforces and repairs your armor. If you do, add +1 and treat your result as if you were 'In the field' instead of 'Under fire.' On a hit, add 'Take +2 momentum: 1 point' to your list of options.
